languages.text: "Да и грабил он в основном тех, о ком ни один истинный имперец не уронит слезы. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносов{/g}, еретиков. Не всегда, конечно... но {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} рассудит, был ли Денз достойным человеком".

"And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."
languages.original_text: "Да и грабил он в основном тех, о ком ни один истинный имперец не уронит слезы. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносов{/g}, еретиков. Не всегда, конечно... но {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} рассудит, был ли Денз достойным человеком".

traits.locale_text: "And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true Imperial will shed tears over. Xenos, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the Emperor will judge if Denz was a decent man."
"And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true Imperial will shed tears over. Xenos, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the Emperor will judge if Denz was a decent man."
"And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true Imperial would shed a tear over. Xenos, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the Emperor will judge if Denz was a decent man."
"And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true Imperial would shed a tear over. Xenos, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the Emperor will judge if Denz was a decent man."

"And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."

languages.text: “至于他劫掠的目标，大部分都是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}和异端分子。如果是真正的帝国臣民，恐怕根本不会为那些人流泪。当然，偶尔也会有例外……不过，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}会判断丹兹是不是个正派人。”
languages.original_text: "And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."

traits.locale_text: “至于他劫掠的目标，大部分都是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}和异端分子。如果是真正热爱帝国的人，恐怕根本不会为那些人流泪。当然，偶尔也会有例外……不过，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}会判断丹兹是不是个正派人。”

languages.text: «Y robaba principalmente a objetivos por los que no lloraría ningún verdadero súbdito del Imperium. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, herejes... no todos, claro... pero el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} será quien juzgue si Denz ha sido un hombre decente».
languages.original_text: "And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."

traits.locale_text: «Y robaba principalmente a objetivos por los que no lloraría ningún verdadero ciudadano del Imperium. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, herejes... no todos, claro... pero el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} será quien juzgue si Denz ha sido un hombre decente».

languages.text: 「それに、彼が強奪した相手のほとんどは真の帝国民なら涙も流さないような類の人種でした。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}に、異端者に…もちろん、全員がそうであったわけではありませんが…デンツがまともな人間であったかどうかは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}が判断なさるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、彼が強奪した相手のほとんどは真の帝国民なら涙も流さないような類の人種でした。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}に、異端者に…もちろん、全員がそうであったわけではありませんが…デンツがまともな人間であったかどうかは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}が判断なさるでしょう」

languages.text: "Und seine Opfer waren meist Gesellen, denen kein wahrer Untertan des Imperiums auch nur eine Träne nachweinen würde. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Ketzer. Nicht alle, versteht sich ... aber der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} wird entscheiden, ob Denz ein anständiger Mann war."
languages.original_text: "And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."

traits.locale_text: "Und seine Opfer waren zumeist Typen, über die kein echter Imperialer auch nur eine Träne vergießen würde. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, Ketzer. Nicht alle, versteht sich ... aber der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} wird entscheiden, ob Denz ein anständiger Mann war."

languages.text: « Quant à ses victimes, la majorité ne méritait pas que les bons citoyens de l'Imperium versent une seule larme à leur sujet. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, des hérétiques. Pas tous, bien sûr... mais l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} jugera lui-même du caractère de Denz. »
languages.original_text: "And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à ses victimes, la majorité ne méritait pas que l'Imperium verse une seule larme à leur sujet. Des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}, des hérétiques. Pas tous, bien sûr... mais l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} jugera lui-même du caractère de Denz. »

languages.text: "Yağmaladıklarıysa genelde İmparatorluk'un hakiki kullarının ardlarından gözyaşı dökmeyeceği tiplerdi. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g} ve kâfirler işte. Gerçi hepsi değildi tabii... Denz'in iyi biri olup olmadığının takdirini {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} verecek artık."
languages.original_text: "And the ones he robbed were mostly types that no true subject of the Imperium would shed a tear over. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, heretics. Not all of them, of course... but the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} will judge if Denz was a decent man."

traits.locale_text: "Yağmaladıklarıysa İmparatorluk tebaasında ardından tek kişinin bile gözyaşı dökmeyeceği kişilerdi. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g}, kâfirler. Hepsi bunlardan değildi tabii ama... Denz'in iyi biri olup olmadığının kararını {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} verecek."
